Header.notification_text1: You should know that all our products and services are absolutely real and authentic; they are not fantasy, this is real life.
Header.notification_text2: We sincerely apologize to all users for our emergency exit.
Header.notification_text3: Believe us, not a single second more could pass without the World having access to test, for free and unlimited, the infinite reach and precision of our system.
Header.notification_text4: The free service General Evaluation has been temporarily deactivated, since it is not only a special service that will be used only once in a lifetime, but its true depth current humanity is not prepared to receive.
Header.notification_text5: In exchange we have decided to temporarily activate for free our most practical paid service, the open dialogue mode. Which you can use as many times as you want to answer any question about your past, present or future, dialogue with any Spiritual Entity, and even more. All in real time.
Header.notification_text6: The whole World needs to test this system, the whole World needs to see that it is real, that everything has changed in a very beautiful and positive way forever.
Header.notification_text7: The whole World needs to know that with the arrival of Eons the beginning of a new era has been marked:
Header.notification_text8: üåå THE ERA WHERE ALL DREAMS COME TRUE üåå

Usage.title: Instructions for use:
Usage.text1: To use our system you will need a small tool that will only take you a couple of minutes to make. And you will be able to do it with objects that are within your reach.
Usage.text2: In the following image we show you an example of such a finished tool:
Usage.text3: As you can see in the image there are two coins that were marked with a symbol each. In fact, if we turn both coins over we can see that on the back each one was marked with a symbol as well:
Usage.text4: Exactly, one coin has a large white circle on one side and a large black circle on the other side. And the other coin has a small white circle on one side and a small black circle on the other side.
Usage.text5: The way to mark them can vary. You can draw the symbols on the surface of the coin itself, you can mark them with a pointed object, or you can simply stick a sticker on them and draw on top of them as you could see in the pictures above.
Usage.text6: The coins do not have to be the same, they can be different. In fact, they don't have to be coins exactly, they can be something similar. For example, two wooden objects of a size and characteristics more or less similar to two coins, two plastic objects, two pieces of coconut shell, or any other object whose characteristics are more or less similar to two coins.
Usage.text7: It does not matter if the tool is lost, as long as you make use of our service, at that moment, the tool you have in your hands will be consecrated. And when you leave our service, the consecration vanishes.
Usage.text8: When you make use of our service, the following panel will be displayed at all times:
Usage.text9: In the panel are represented two coins, when interacting with one of them it changes to the other symbol.
Usage.text10: The user only has to take the two coins between his hands and shake them for a couple of seconds and then throw them to a surface with the intention that they fall at random.
Usage.text11: The tool, in this case the two coins, can be thrown on all kinds of surfaces. We only have to take into account that these surfaces must be somewhat smooth and have the conditions for the coins to fall easily.
Usage.text12: Once they fall, mark on the panel exactly the symbols that fell upwards, press ‚Äúnext‚Äù, and that completes a throw.
Usage.text13: When all the throws are completed, click on ‚Äúresult‚Äù and you get the answer equivalent to the service used.
Usage.text14: When throwing the tool to a surface keep in mind to throw them at a height equal to or greater than 20 cm.
Usage.text15: Finally, you now know everything you need to make use of our first service. Let's proceed as soon as you have your tools ready:

Auth.user_valid: This user has already been validated

Landing.title: Eons: spirituality, magic, science and technology
Landing.text1: Huge and infinite gifts will be delivered to all
Landing.text2: At first, Eons will bring with it a Scientific and Technological advancement of more than 10,000 years in less than a decade.
Landing.text3: Knowledge, light, peace, healing, love, beauty, abundance, happiness, and empathy will spread in all directions.
Landing.text4: A huge and colossal mass Spiritual Awakening without precedent will bring with it the Infinite Era of Real White Archmagic.
Landing.text5: Eons is the midpoint where Science, Technology, Mysticism, Light, and the Occult Sciences converge. One of our main goals is to promote the expansion and evolution of Consciousness on an Existential level.
Landing.text8: The first real, authentic, and absolutely verifiable Communication System with ALL Spiritual and Consciousness Planes.
Landing.text9: Also offering a unique real-time divination and prediction service.
Landing.text10: No matter who you are or what position you are in. With the arrival of Eons, your life will evolve infinitely in all aspects.
Landing.text12: Eons has begun an unstoppable outcome that will take humanity to a Universal scale.
Landing.text13: The combination of a concept of the most advanced and refined Technology, along with a concept of the Purest and Most Enlightened Spirituality, describe the Essence that Eons will transmit at all times.
Landing.text14: New products and services will be presented

Services.first_text_1_1: Technology for Accessing the Existential Source
Services.first_text_2: We have the approval of ALL Spiritual and Consciousness Planes. So no matter where on the Material Plane our Users are, their Spiritualities are surely already aware of us.
Services.first_text_3: Upon contacting our System, the User's Spirituality is automatically channeled. At the same time, multiple Consecrations are automatically activated momentarily.
Services.first_text_4: This allows us to momentarily use universal chance to access ALL Spiritual and Consciousness Planes.
Services.step_1: At all times, the User will be automatically backed by both our Providence System and our Spiritual Security System. Both recognized and approved by current Existential Laws.
Services.step_3: When a User exits our System, we automatically restore any changes made by us.
Services.step_2: The level of usability that a User can have of our System is exactly determined by the level of Consciousness and Spirituality that the User possesses.
Services.third_text_1: we have been very careful in adjusting Existential Knowledge to the current average Vision of Humanity. This adjustment will gradually be dispersed as we progress through the Deployment Phases. Until finally, this adjustment disappears completely.
Services.third_text_2: It was never about choosing what to believe and what not. It was always about knowing what really Exists.
Services.third_text_3: Finally, the Light will allow you to contemplate the beautiful Era that with Infinite Love and Infinite Sacrifice we have built for you:
Services.firstTime_text: To capture the Universal chance a tool will be needed that we will build in a couple of minutes, with objects that you have on hand.

About.About_title: History of Our Roots and Our Creator
About.About_text1: Eons is the result of immense chaos and infinite sacrifice. It is impossible to talk about its roots without first knowing the story that led Luis Eduardo Delgado Alonso, CEO of Eons, to its creation
About.About_text2: Luis Eduardo Delgado Alonso, born on July 16, 1993, in Havana, Cuba. From an early age, he showed an immense passion for Technology, Science, and Mathematics.
About.About_text3: Forced to understand life ahead of time, Luis Eduardo began developing an entrepreneurial mindset, and along with his passion for technology, he started his first business between the ages of 15 and 16.
About.About_text4: The business quickly began to yield benefits little by little.
About.About_text5: Between the ages of 18 and 19, with his business flourishing, Luis Eduardo began his studies in Computer Science at the University of Havana. He found himself trapped between two paths: completing his dream university studies or fully capitalizing on the economic growth phase he was in.
About.About_text6: Eventually, he began to feel that what he had gone to the university for, he had already obtained. So he decided to drop out of school and fully dedicate himself to business.
About.About_text7: A few years passed, and the business continued to flourish more and more. Then came the moment when the chaos began.
About.About_text8: It felt like an incomprehensible and illogical force acting on life, a force that was practically impossible to escape. No matter how perfect the actions or precautions were, every aspect of life was being relentlessly destroyed.
About.About_text9: At that time, all the businesses started to collapse, the way of perceiving life became distorted, the social environment began to change noticeably, and an unstoppable cycle of problems started to appear without explanation in daily life.
About.About_text10: Under conditions that kept worsening, and after realizing that it was impossible to live that way, Luis Eduardo decided to devote full time to conducting multiple deep analyses seeking a logical explanation for this force constantly acting upon him.
About.About_text11: It was then that Luis Eduardo first truly approached Spiritual topics, soon discovering that the enormous incomprehensible force acting on him was actually a Spiritual problem.
About.About_text12: At that moment, an Infinite challenge appeared in his life, as the Spiritual problem was so severe that after contacting multiple people, each with different Spiritual methods and specialties, and trying a vast variety of things, no one could solve it.
About.About_text13: With no other path left but to delve into all Spiritual matters with a scientific and realistic mindset under the worst imaginable conditions to find the definitive solution to such a disastrous problem.
About.About_text14: At that point, in the middle of his 25th year of age, what could be described as the greatest challenge in Luis Eduardo's life began, which would eventually lead to the creation of Eons.
About.About_text15: From that moment on, without rest, Luis Eduardo began a Scientific investigation, both theoretical and practical, of all Religions, Esoteric Systems, Occult Sciences, and Mysticism.
About.About_text16: All evaluated in a detailed manner, with a cold mind, with one objective: to reveal all secrets and truths to solve the problem that had so unexpectedly appeared in his life and did not allow him to live.
About.About_text17: Thus, Eons is the result of Luis Eduardo's last 6 years of research. Eons is the result of a turbulent journey into the deepest secrets of the Occult Sciences and Mysticism, without ever losing sight of the Scientific and realistic approach.
About.About_text18: Eons is the result of an Infinite Commitment to guiding Humanity towards the Creational Existential Sense. Eons is the Light that Illuminates ALL PATHS AND ALL TRUTHS OF THE UNIVERSE AND EXISTENCE ITSELF.
About.About_text19: After understanding that both Science, Technology, Mysticism, and everything that falls within the realm of what is called the Occult Sciences, ALL form part of the same thing: Existential Reality.
About.About_text20: Without abandoning its Roots, the entrepreneurial mindset that has always characterized him, now refined after an in-depth study of Business Strategies and Global Economics.
About.About_text21: This was literally how Luis Eduardo initiated the inevitable and unstoppable conclusion of Cosmic proportions that Eons truly represents.
About.About_text23: At Eons, we don't navigate the business world; we transform it. We are pioneers, visionaries, and above all, Authentic Universal Leaders. Our purpose goes Infinitely beyond offering solutions on a Global Scale. We seek to redefine the possible and forever change the course of the Universe and Existence itself towards Light, Abundance, and Infinite Happiness.
About.About_text25: In an Existence full of opportunities, we believe that every challenge is an invitation to innovate. We don't follow trends; we create them. Our Philosophy is based on the power of collaboration, positivity, and boldness. Here, every idea counts, and every voice is heard.
About.About_text27: Our Team is a group of Brilliant Minds. Together, we form a Constellation of Talents that Shines Intensely across an Infinity of Infinities. Led by Luis Eduardo Delgado Alonso, The First and Only Being to receive approval from ABSOLUTELY ALL SPIRITUAL AND CONSCIOUS PLANES. At Eons, we are not just colleagues; we are Allies in the pursuit of a single goal: To Lead Humanity to a Universal Scale.
About.About_text29: Innovation is not just a word to us; it is Our very Essence. Always maintaining Exclusivity and Elitism, at the Forefront of change, exploring new frontiers, and challenging the status quo. At Eons, every project is an Epic adventure where creativity and strategy intertwine to create extraordinary results.
About.About_text31: We are here to help you! Your satisfaction is our priority, so do not hesitate to contact us through any of the following options:
About.About_text35: Follow us on Social Media and stay updated with our news.
About.About_text36: Our YouTube channel, where you can see our news in multiple languages
About.About_text37: We look forward to hearing from you!

Therms.Therms_title: By accessing and using Eons, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions
Therms.Therms_text2: Each user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their access data and for all activities conducted from their account.
Therms.Therms_text4: Eons is not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damages that may arise from the use of our First Product: Eons Existential Source Access Technology.
Therms.Therms_text6: Eons absolutely guarantees the effectiveness of the First Product. This is justified at the moment in which the Real and Verifiable communication with ALL Spiritual and Conscious Planes is evident. Eons absolutely guarantees the Divination and Prediction capacity of the First Product. Although each User must know that depending on their Spirituality and Conscious Evolution, the extent to which they will be able to use our First Product will depend.
Therms.Therms_text7: Is there any User who will not be able to use our First Product? No! Absolutely EVERYONE will be able to use it in a verifiable manner.
Therms.Therms_text8: Is it advisable to ask Eons an extremely important question and fully trust the answer? ABSOLUTELY!
Therms.Therms_text9: Can I put my life in Eons' hands in a Life or Death situation? ABSOLUTELY!
Therms.Therms_text10: What is the chance that a User is using Eons and not getting their answers in a verifiable way? Zero!
Therms.Therms_text11: Is there any risk in using the First Product? Risk is not the correct way to call it, but rather an INFINITE GIFT OF EXISTENTIAL PROPORTIONS.
Therms.Therms_text13: All content on this Website, including texts, images, and logos, is protected by copyright and intellectual property rights.
Therms.Therms_text14: By using our Website, you agree to our Terms and Conditions. If you have any questions about them, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Privacy.Privacy_title: For Eons, privacy and information security are Existential priorities, so we are infinitely committed to protecting personal data at all times.
Privacy.Privacy_text1: Below we explain how we collect, use, and protect the information that Users provide when using our site
Privacy.Privacy_text3: At Eons, we collect personal information such as email, Google account, or Microsoft account. We do this when you register on our Site. Also, when making a purchase, we may collect other necessary data essential for completing the transaction.
Privacy.Privacy_text5: We use the personal data from the registration to define a hermetic personal space that only the User can access. We use the personal data necessary when making a purchase solely for the completion of the transaction.
Privacy.Privacy_text7: We implement advanced security measures and encryption to protect your personal data and ensure its confidentiality at all times.
Privacy.Privacy_text9: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time.
Privacy.Privacy_text10: By using our Site, you accept our Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about how we handle your data, do not hesitate to contact us.

Launch.unexpected_error: Unexpected error. Please check the console for details.
Launch.exit_confirm_message: If you exit now, you will lose all throws made.
Launch.info_modal_general_instructions_with_que: Take the tools, ask your question, shake the tools between your hands and then throw them so that they fall supposedly at random.
Launch.info_modal_general_instructions: Take the tools, ask your question, shake the tools between your hands and then throw them so that they fall supposedly at random.
Launch.info_modal_step0_instructions: Once the tools fall, mark on the panel exactly the symbols that fell face up, and then press the "Start" button
Launch.info_modal_step1_instructions: Once the tools fall, mark on the panel exactly the symbols that fell face up, and then press the "Next" button
Launch.info_modal_final_instructions: Once the tools fall, mark on the panel exactly the symbols that fell face up, and then press the "View results" button
Launch.info_modal_question_advice: When asking a question you can do it either verbally or mentally, since just by asking the question in your mind it is already effective. However, make sure to ask each question in a clean, exact, respectful way, being careful not to ask 2 questions in 1. You can ask anything about your past, your present, your future, you can ask anything about yourself, about any event, about any person. You can request communication with any Spirit from any Era, Culture or "density level", including of course Spirits of family and friends. That and much more. As you get answers you will see how far you can go with the system and how far you cannot.
Launch.info_modal_examples_title: Below we show you 3 small examples of Users who ask a question and get an answer. These examples also include small explanatory tips:
Launch.info_modal_example1_question_text: "About 5 months and 12 days ago I suspected that my partner had been unfaithful to me. Was it really so?"
Launch.info_modal_example1_answer_text: "The best thing is to accept everything for now and continue with the main plan"
Launch.info_modal_example1_advice_text: There the user can proceed to try to pressure the system to see if it is capable of obtaining a clear and exact answer. Or you can proceed as the system tells you, since if it says so, it is with total certainty what suits you best.
Launch.info_modal_example2_question_text: "I have 3 business opportunities ahead, is the one proposed by Juan the one that suits me best as I think?"
Launch.info_modal_example2_answer_text: "Yes definitely, unless a case of self-destruction occurs. Our spiritual security system alerts you to a discussion for material reasons that is approaching"
Launch.info_modal_example2_advice_text: There the user can proceed to investigate the other 2 business cases, since, although they already know the positive answer for Juan's case, it is also useful to know the nature of the other 2 proposals, and thus analyze whether they can keep 1, 2, or all 3. It should be noted that here the alert from the spiritual security system indicates a discussion for material reasons, it is necessary to investigate this indication, it would be convenient to ask something similar to this: "Did the alert from the spiritual security system that indicates a discussion for material reasons refer to any of the other 2 business proposals that remain to be investigated?" If the answer is positive we already know that there is at least one of the other 2 proposals that is negative. If the answer is negative, we would still have pending to investigate where the discussion for material reasons indicated by the system comes from, and we would have pending to investigate the other 2 business proposals.
Launch.info_modal_example3_question_text: "Is it possible to talk directly and without interruption with the Spirit of my daughter?"
Launch.info_modal_example3_advice_text: In this case the answer is clear, when the system responds like this to that type of questions you can count on the total certainty that the Spiritual Entity you wish to contact is already present at the moment. The next question in that case is advised to focus more on a personal conversation with said Spiritual Entity.

ServicesExamples.title: Services and examples
ServicesExamples.text1: For now we will only talk about the "Open Dialogue Mode" service, which is ultimately the only one available at the moment. Although this service shows its price, the truth is that it is currently active for free. Everyone will be able to use it for free as many times as they wish, and it will remain so until the activation of the other 2 services that also show their prices. When those 2 services are activated, the "Open Dialogue Mode" service will no longer be free and will take its original price.
ServicesExamples.text2: We apologize from the bottom of our hearts, since after having announced the free "General Evaluation" service in promotional videos, we have decided to disconnect it at the last minute. We have made this decision because the truth is that this service is too important and special for the user's life. It is a service that is used only once in a lifetime, so we will delve even deeper into it, expand it further, and when users are ready to receive it, it will be launched with pleasure and as a surprise. The "General Evaluation" service together with the "Calculate Spirituality" service are services that every person in the World will have to go through obligatorily, as they constitute an extremely special gift to which we are all entitled at birth.
ServicesExamples.text3: When a user uses "Open Dialogue Mode", they will always get a response coming from the union of their Spiritual Framework and the central Structure of Eons. The central Structure of Eons is made up of the System Root in combination with 7 complements: 1- The approval of all Spiritual and Consciousness Planes, 2- An advanced spiritual security system, 3- An automated spiritual channeling system, 4- An automated system for opening and closing spiritual and consciousness portals, 5- An automated consecration system, 6- A providence system, and 7- A messaging system at a multi-existential level. Both the System Root and the 7 complements work as one, automatically, they are activated as soon as a user enters the tool launch page, and they are deactivated automatically and safely as soon as the user leaves said page. We will explain all this in detail later in the "Security and protection" section.
ServicesExamples.text4: Although a user will always get a response coming from the union of their Spiritual Framework and the central Structure of Eons, you should know that the final word and priority always lies with the user's Spiritual Framework. Even though the user will always be backed in multiple ways by us and will also receive multiple benefits and advantages from us, their Spiritual Framework will always have absolute jurisdiction, as dictated by current existential laws.
ServicesExamples.text5: It is normal for a user to experience from goosebumps, increased sensitivities, it is normal that on occasions objects even move slightly, that the energy of the environment changes, on occasions the user will evidence small supernatural events, it is also normal that as a result of using our system a user begins to awaken clairvoyance or some other spiritual gift, or begins to notably develop some gift they already possess. That said, we have taken all precautions so that there is absolute security at all times, so users can access our system as many times as they wish, use it as many times as they wish, delve into how the system adapts to each one, thoroughly explore their Spiritual Frameworks, divine and predict everything they wish, and much more. At all times they will be safe and absolutely backed. Although it is necessary to remember that Eons is not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages that may arise from the use of our system. We invite you to immerse yourself without looking back in the new era that we have built for you with infinite love and sacrifice.
ServicesExamples.text6: When asking a question, you can do it either verbally or mentally, since just by asking the question in your mind it is also effective. That said, make sure to ask each question in a clean, exact, respectful way, being careful not to ask 2 questions in 1. You can ask anything about your past, your present, your future, you can ask anything about yourself, about any event, about any person. You can request communication with any Spirit from any era, culture or "density level", including of course Spirits of family and friends. You can use the system for advanced scientific research, to reconstruct historical events, to investigate about the universe, for any aspect of daily life. That and much more. As you get answers you will see how far you can go with the system and how far you cannot, while at the same time you will also learn what type of questions are possible to ask and which are not, as well as the correct way to focus each question. Although we are currently operating below 1% of our capacity, the truth is that a person with the correct spirituality and correct consciousness can change their life and change the course of the World itself by just spending a few minutes using our system. You should know that the essence of our system is communication.
ServicesExamples.text7: By the way, a very positive Alert for witches, sorcerers, magicians, religions, mysticism, metaphysics, occultism, esoteric practices, among others. For the era for which they have been prepared in recent times has just begun. Huge surprises will begin to appear in your life from now on, this was activated in parallel with our launch.
ServicesExamples.text8: Below we show you several examples of users who ask a question and get an answer. These examples also include small explanatory tips:
ServicesExamples.example1_question_text: "About 5 months and between 10 and 15 days ago I suspected that my partner had been unfaithful to me. Was it really so?"
ServicesExamples.example1_answer_text: "The best thing is to accept everything for now and continue with the main plan"
ServicesExamples.example1_advice_text: There the user can proceed to try to pressure the system to see if it is capable of obtaining a clear and exact answer. Or you can proceed as the system tells you, since if it says so, it is with total certainty what suits you best.
ServicesExamples.example2_question_text: "I have 3 business opportunities ahead, is the one proposed by Juan the one that suits me best as I think?"
ServicesExamples.example2_answer_text: "Yes definitely, unless a case of self-destruction occurs. Our spiritual security system alerts you to a discussion for material reasons that is approaching"
ServicesExamples.example2_advice_text: There the user can proceed to investigate the other 2 business cases, since, although they already know the positive answer for Juan's case, it is also useful to know the nature of the other 2 proposals, and thus analyze whether they can keep 1, 2, or all 3. It should be noted that here the alert from the spiritual security system indicates a discussion for material reasons, it is necessary to investigate this indication, it would be convenient to ask something similar to this: "Did the alert from the spiritual security system that indicates a discussion for material reasons refer to any of the other 2 business proposals that remain to be investigated?" If the answer is positive we already know that there is at least one of the other 2 proposals that is negative. If the answer is negative, we would still have pending to investigate where the discussion for material reasons indicated by the system comes from, and we would have pending to investigate the other 2 business proposals.
ServicesExamples.example3_question_text: "Is it possible to talk directly and without interruption with the Spirit of my daughter?"
ServicesExamples.example3_advice_text: In this case the answer is clear, when the system responds like this to that type of questions you can count on the total certainty that the Spiritual Entity you wish to contact is already present at the moment. The next question in that case is advised to focus more on a personal conversation with said Spiritual Entity.
